video.title: Zig & Sharko
video.synopsis: Zig, an island-bound hyena, will do anything to get his paws on Marina the mermaid, but her devoted pal Sharko always comes to her rescue in time.

episodes.synopsis: While hunting a mermaid, Zig, a hungry hyena, is stopped by a huge shark. / Zig makes a powerful laser beam. / King Neptune falls in love with Marina.
episodes.title: Fishy Story / Desert Island Drought / King Neptune's Court

episodes.synopsis: An oil spill leaves Marina stranded on her rock. / A newly wealthy Sharko buys the entire island to seduce Marina. / A snowstorm hits the island.
episodes.title: The Slick/ Treasure Island Tricks/ Cold Snap

episodes.synopsis: Marina sees Bernie as a kind of sea poodle and adopts him as her pet. / Sharko must rebuild Marina's house. / Zig builds a series of naval vessels.
episodes.title: Mermaid's Pup/ Work in Progress/ Cruising

episodes.synopsis: Marina dreams of being a stewardess. / A castaway lands on the island and falls in love with Marina. / Zig decides to dig a tunnel to Marina's rock.
episodes.title: Mermaid in the Sky/ A Lovesick Survivor/ Digging Deep

episodes.synopsis: Marina takes up waterskiing. / Marina plays nurse to Zig when he throws out his back. / Bernie adopts hundreds of cute abandoned baby hermit crabs.
episodes.title: Waterski Hit/ Nurse Marina/ Hundreds of Kids and Counting

episodes.synopsis: Zig and Bernie disguise a submarine as a fish. / Zig and Bernie use a mannequin to lure Marina onto the island. / Zig befriends a shrimp.
episodes.title: The Submarine/ A Tale of Two Legs/ Little Shrimp Buddy

episodes.synopsis: Sharko invites Marina out for a romantic evening. / Zig decides to harness a volcano's energy. / Zig decides to destroy the lagoon's new lighthouse.
episodes.title: The Horribly Hungry Hyena/ Volcano Turbo/ Lighthouse

episodes.synopsis: Zig builds bamboo inventions to catch Marina. / Zig uses inflatable objects to try to nab Marina. / A ship washes up with a cargo of Lego-type bricks.
episodes.title: Bamboozled/ Blown Up/ Silly Builders

episodes.synopsis: Another mermaid suddenly shows up in the lagoon. / Marina plays golf with Sharko. / Zig and Bernie organize a go-kart race around the island.
episodes.title: The Manic Mermaid/ Aqua Golf/ The Island Tour

episodes.synopsis: The lagoon is invaded by whales. / Zig decides to dress up as Santa Claus. / Marina finds herself caught in the old pool at the end of the island.
episodes.title: Moby Zig/ Santa Zig/ Saving Mermaid Marina

episodes.synopsis: Zig tries to use a magic wand to kidnap Marina. / Sharko enlists his hammerhead shark cousin to protect Marina. / A whaling ship tries to nab Sharko.
episodes.title: Silly Sleight of Hand/ Hammerhead Cousin/ Sharko Hunting

episodes.synopsis: A male manta ray charms Marina. / Zig organizes a birthday party for Marina. / A jaguar coaches Zig to turn him into a forbidding brute.
episodes.title: The Challengers/ Birthday Party/ The Coach

episodes.synopsis: Sharko transforms the volcano into a ski resort. / Marina hires a butler. / A human being fishes up the mermaid -- and takes her to an aquatic zoo.
episodes.title: Frozen Island/ At Your Service/ Freedom for Marina

episodes.synopsis: Marina is depressed and bored -- she needs a girlfriend. / Sharko has a fan, a little piranha. / Marina wakes a pirate's ghost, who moves in with her.
episodes.title: Marina's New Friend/ The Fan/ The Ghastly Ghost

episodes.synopsis: The lagoon's waters rise and almost engulf the island. / Zig sets up a fun fair to snatch Marina in the rides. / Zig befriends an elephant.
episodes.title: Sea's Up/ Fairground Follies!/ Zig's Jumbo Friend

episodes.synopsis: Zig and Sharko land in the abyss. / Marina takes care of a little octopus. / Zig finds a book full of diagrams of brilliant inventions.
episodes.title: Bottom's Bottom/ Babysitting/ Caution. Genius at Work!

episodes.synopsis: Zig decides to go to Africa and meet his compatriots. / Sharko's parents show up for a surprise visit. / Marina and Sharko go on a camping holiday.
episodes.title: Goin Home/ Sharko and His Folks/ Camping Calamity

episodes.synopsis: Zig catches a shape-shifting jellyfish. / Sharko has a chronic case of hiccups. / Bernie decides to boost Zig's morale by making him into a superhero.
episodes.title: Magical JellyFish/ Boo...Who!/ Super Zig

episodes.synopsis: Bernie concocts a superstrength potion. / Zig is knocked out and wakes up in a Western. / Neptune decides to build a highway through Marina's villa.
episodes.title: The Tiny Tyrant / Coral Reef Cowboys/ The King's Highway

episodes.synopsis: Marina gets legs. / Zig and Bernie make origami mermaid traps. / After an encounter with an eel, Zig finds himself in Sharko's skin, and vice-versa.
episodes.title: Fancy Footwork / Origami / Me, Myself & I

episodes.synopsis: Bernie creates clones of Zig; Marina becomes a lifeguard; a fierce pirate drops anchor in the lagoon.
episodes.title: War of the Clones/ Save the Hyena!/ Bristlebeard's Adventure

episodes.synopsis: Sharko and Zig compete in a medieval tournament; Neptune throws Sharko into the dungeon; Neptune has Marina record a CD.
episodes.title: The Noble Knights of the Lagoon/ Troublemakers/ Marina Superstar

episodes.synopsis: Zig changes into a were-yena; Marina and Sharko board a luxury liner for a cruise; Zig gets hit by lightning.
episodes.title: The Were-Yena/ Loony Cruise/ Lightning Love

episodes.synopsis: Bernie moves to another island; Marina's hairdresser accidentally cuts half her hair off; a meteor washes up on the beach.
episodes.title: Bernie Moves House/ Hair Story/ Space Fruits

episodes.synopsis: Zig builds a taxi pedal boat; Sharko becomes the new cop; A crazy astronaut uses Sharko for scientific experiments.
episodes.title: Zig Taxi-Driver/ Cop Duty/ Goofy Astronauts

episodes.synopsis: Fisherman starts raking the seabed to get scallops; Bernie find the crazy dolphin to capture Marina; Zig uses toys to capture his mermaid.
episodes.title: Fisherman's Catch/ The Return of the Crazy Dolphin/ Toys Attack!
